by_patient.index: function (doc) {if (doc.type != 'Patient') { return null }; var ret = new Document(); ret.add(doc.facilityId, { 'field': 'facilityId', 'type': 'int' }); ret.add(doc.motechId, { 'field': 'motechId'}); for each(att in doc.person.attributes) { ret.add(att.value, { 'field': att.name });} return ret;}
